/ABOUT

In summary, my journey from Mathematical Olympiads to programming has been one of discovery and growth. I'm excited to keep learning, innovating, and collaborating with fellow tech enthusiasts. Ready to embrace new challenges and opportunities, I'm grateful for your visit to my portfolio.

Hello! I'm Juan Pablo Lopez, a 22-year-old from Argentina. My passion for problem-solving and logical thinking stems from my parents, who are mathematics professors. I delved into the world of Mathematical Olympiads from an early age, sparking my curiosity and driving me to explore.
While pursuing Civil Engineering, I stumbled upon programming and was instantly captivated. I transitioned my focus, completing the Full Stack Developer bootcamp at soyHenry and joining the Henry Heroes team as a mentor.
Since then, I've continued to learn independently, working on personal and group projects. This experience equipped me to apply my software development skills in real-world projects.
Outside of work, I'm an avid soccer enthusiast. The sport has instilled values of teamwork, discipline, and perseverance in me, which I apply to both my personal and professional life.

/EXPERIENCE

/Gen Consultores:

02/2023 - Now

I led projects creating personal finance and raffle apps using React, Next, Tailwind, and MongoDB. The finance app tracked expenses securely, and the raffle app ensured fair winner selection. Effective leadership, planning, design, development, testing, and maintenance ensured high-quality outcomes in both projects.

/Eat Fix - freelance:

06/2023 - Now

I built an AI-driven diet app with Next.js, TypeScript, React, Prism, and PostgreSQL. The AI personalizes diet plans for users' health and fitness goals. It features a user-friendly interface, strong security, and ongoing maintenance for relevance.

/Sirunn Patisserie:

11/2022 - 12/2022

I led the backend development for a team e-commerce project using SCRUM. We used Next.js, React, TypeScript, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and Tailwind CSS to build a flexible and secure platform, delivering a seamless shopping experience.
